title: 'If we end war now, Hamas will return': Israeli PM Netanyahu
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vowed to continue the 14-month Gaza war, rejecting ceasefire efforts. He stated that halting the war would allow Hamas to regroup and attack again. Netanyahu acknowledged the changing regional dynamics with the fall of Assad in Syria, potentially opening doors for a hostage deal, but cautioned against premature optimism.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu vowed to continue the 14-month Gaza war, rejecting ceasefire efforts. He stated that halting the war would allow Hamas to regroup and attack again. Netanyahu acknowledged the changing regional dynamics with the fall of Assad in Syria, potentially opening doors for a hostage deal, but cautioned against premature optimism.

title: Brian Thompson killer suspect identified as ex-Ivy League student Luigi Mangione
content: Sources told the New York Post that 26-year-old Luigi Mangione had a personal interest in hating the medical community -- his grandmother died in 2013 and grandfather in 2017. A manifesto was found on him apart from the gun, a silencer and four fake IDs with names that he used in New York City. The manifesto rallied against the US healthcare industry.
summary: Sources told the New York Post that 26-year-old Luigi Mangione had a personal interest in hating the medical community -- his grandmother died in 2013 and grandfather in 2017. A manifesto was found on him apart from the gun, a silencer and four fake IDs with names that he used in New York City. The manifesto rallied against the US healthcare industry.

title: 'Racist f**king country': Massive protest in New York as Daniel Penny acquitted; X users call it 'George Floyd 2.0'
content: “Racist f**king country,” one Black Lives Matter supporter yelled as she left the room. Another Neely supporter, turning to Penney, screamed, “It’s a small world, buddy,” before leaving the room. ​Neely boarded a subway under Manhattan on May 1, 2023, hurled his jacket onto the floor, and declared that he was hungry and thirsty and didn’t care if he died or went to jail, witnesses said. Penny came up behind Neely, grabbed his neck, took him to the floor and “put him out".
summary: “Racist f**king country,” one Black Lives Matter supporter yelled as she left the room. Another Neely supporter, turning to Penney, screamed, “It’s a small world, buddy,” before leaving the room. ​Neely boarded a subway under Manhattan on May 1, 2023, hurled his jacket onto the floor, and declared that he was hungry and thirsty and didn’t care if he died or went to jail, witnesses said. Penny came up behind Neely, grabbed his neck, took him to the floor and “put him out".

title: UK indicates lifting ban on HTS if it delivers on its promises
content: The UK government is considering lifting the ban on Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), an Islamist militant group that recently overthrew the Assad regime in Syria. This potential shift hinges on HTS upholding its promises to protect minority rights and ensure citizen safety. While HTS has historical ties to al-Qaeda, it claims to have severed those connections.
summary: The UK government is considering lifting the ban on Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), an Islamist militant group that recently overthrew the Assad regime in Syria. This potential shift hinges on HTS upholding its promises to protect minority rights and ensure citizen safety. While HTS has historical ties to al-Qaeda, it claims to have severed those connections.

title: 'Andrew Witty to be next': Open threat to another CEO on social media after he says...
content: UnitedHealth Group CEO Andrew Witty in his address to the company staff said their duty to prevent dubious health insurance claims would continue and that drew flak on social media after Brian Thompson's death and social media users openly called for Andrew Witty's killing and said he should be the next target.
summary: UnitedHealth Group CEO Andrew Witty in his address to the company staff said their duty to prevent dubious health insurance claims would continue and that drew flak on social media after Brian Thompson's death and social media users openly called for Andrew Witty's killing and said he should be the next target.

title: Merriam-Webster declares word of the year: ‘Polarization’
content: Merriam-Webster declared "polarization" as its 2024 Word of the Year, reflecting the deep divisions highlighted by the US presidential election. Lookups surged for words like "demure," "fortnight," and "allision" due to viral videos, music, and news events. "Resonate" saw increased usage in AI-generated texts, while "cognitive," "pander," and "democracy" captured political discourse.
summary: Merriam-Webster declared "polarization" as its 2024 Word of the Year, reflecting the deep divisions highlighted by the US presidential election.  Lookups surged for words like "demure," "fortnight," and "allision" due to viral videos, music, and news events.  "Resonate" saw increased usage in AI-generated texts, while "cognitive," "pander," and "democracy" captured political discourse.

title: Person of interest arrested in connection with UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting
content: ​The first arrest in connection with the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was made on Monday in Pennsylvania. The man was nabbed while trying to use a fake ID at a McDonald's and was taken into custody by cops in Altoona, about 233 miles west of New York City.
summary: ​The first arrest in connection with the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was made on Monday in Pennsylvania. The man was nabbed while trying to use a fake ID at a McDonald's and was taken into custody by cops in Altoona, about 233 miles west of New York City.

title: ‘Volunteer IT Consultant': Elon Musk just picked his own designation for DOGE
content: Elon Musk wants to spearhead the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) to modernize outdated federal IT systems. Musk highlighted the systems' inability to track taxpayer money effectively, citing a 2019 report revealing significant maintenance costs and security risks. DOGE aims to reduce government waste and improve accountability, with a focus on entitlement program inefficiencies.
summary: Elon Musk wants to spearhead the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) to modernize outdated federal IT systems.  Musk highlighted the systems' inability to track taxpayer money effectively, citing a 2019 report revealing significant maintenance costs and security risks.  DOGE aims to reduce government waste and improve accountability, with a focus on entitlement program inefficiencies.

title: Who is Emily Clouse? County Commissioner facing allegations of forcing aide into relationship
content: Thurston County Commissioner Emily Clouse faces scrutiny following an investigation into her conduct. While cleared of sexual harassment and retaliation, the investigation confirmed a romantic relationship with her former aide, Allyn Hershey, violating ethical guidelines. Clouse also borrowed money and accepted gifts from Hershey, further breaching ethical standards.
summary: Thurston County Commissioner Emily Clouse faces scrutiny following an investigation into her conduct. While cleared of sexual harassment and retaliation, the investigation confirmed a romantic relationship with her former aide, Allyn Hershey, violating ethical guidelines. Clouse also borrowed money and accepted gifts from Hershey, further breaching ethical standards.

title: Bizarre conspiracy theory claims Brian Thompson might have hired someone to kill him because...
content: Neil Franklin on a CNN panel recently said that he won't be surprised if it's proved that UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson himself hired the killer to murder him. Franklin said such a possibility for insurance, for many other reasons can not be ruled out because the killer had too much information about the exact time Brian Thompson would appear in front of the hotel.
summary: Neil Franklin on a CNN panel recently said that he won't be surprised if it's proved that UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson himself hired the killer to murder him. Franklin said such a possibility for insurance, for many other reasons can not be ruled out because the killer had too much information about the exact time Brian Thompson would appear in front of the hotel.

title: 'Bad spell': How 'witchcraft' sparked nearly 200 executions in Haiti
content: Over 180 people were massacred in Cité Soleil, Haiti, over the weekend, according to the UN. A gang leader allegedly ordered the killings as revenge for his son's death, which he believed was caused by witchcraft. Elderly Vodou practitioners were specifically targeted, with many bodies burned or disposed of at sea. The violence highlights Haiti's escalating gang crisis and dire security situation.
summary: Over 180 people were massacred in Cité Soleil, Haiti, over the weekend, according to the UN. A gang leader allegedly ordered the killings as revenge for his son's death, which he believed was caused by witchcraft.  Elderly Vodou practitioners were specifically targeted, with many bodies burned or disposed of at sea. The violence highlights Haiti's escalating gang crisis and dire security situation.

title: Harris to Musk: The 10 contenders for Time’s Person of the Year 2024
content: The announcement of TIME's 2024 Person of the Year is eagerly awaited and will be made on Thursday. This annual tradition, which began in 1927, celebrates individuals, groups, or ideas that have had the greatest influence—positive or negative—on global events over the past year. Last year, the title went to music sensation Taylor Swift. Past recipients include Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and the “spirit of Ukraine” in 2022, tech entrepreneur Elon Musk in 2021, Ebola fighters in 2014, and former U.S. President Barack Obama in both 2008 and 2012.
summary: The announcement of TIME's 2024 Person of the Year is eagerly awaited and will be made on Thursday. This annual tradition, which began in 1927, celebrates individuals, groups, or ideas that have had the greatest influence—positive or negative—on global events over the past year. Last year, the title went to music sensation Taylor Swift. Past recipients include Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and the “spirit of Ukraine” in 2022, tech entrepreneur Elon Musk in 2021, Ebola fighters in 2014, and former U.S. President Barack Obama in both 2008 and 2012.

title: Harris, Trump or Musk? See full list of finalists for TIME’s Person of the Year 2024
Passenger on Mexico flight tries to hijack and divert plane to US, arrested
content: A Volaris flight from León to Tijuana was diverted to Guadalajara after a passenger attempted to hijack the plane. The 31-year-old man, claiming his family was threatened, assaulted a flight attendant and tried to enter the cockpit. He was apprehended by the crew and handed over to authorities upon landing. The flight later continued to its original destination.
summary: A Volaris flight from León to Tijuana was diverted to Guadalajara after a passenger attempted to hijack the plane.  The 31-year-old man, claiming his family was threatened, assaulted a flight attendant and tried to enter the cockpit.  He was apprehended by the crew and handed over to authorities upon landing. The flight later continued to its original destination.

title: Elon Musk's 4-year-old son has this 4-word advice for father in viral video
content: "The kid has great instincts," Elon Musk wrote sharing a video of his four-year-old son X AE A-XII giving him some advice. The video went viral as it was the first time X was seen talking. "Barron Trump and Lil X will one day be President and Vice President," one comment to the video said. "DOGE jr for president 2084," another comment said.

title: The Don’s Consigliere: Why Trump chose Allina Habba to be Counsellor to President
content: Habba’s appointment as Counselor to the President reads like a scene from a mob movie. The Boss—facing a never-ending string of legal indictments, defamation suits, and scandals—needed someone not just with sharp legal skills but with undying loyalty. Enter Habba, who has proven herself time and again to be the kind of consigliere who will go to the mattresses for her Don, whether it’s suing Hillary Clinton for RICO or locking horns with Judge Lewis Kaplan in the E. Jean Carroll defamation case.
summary: Habba’s appointment as Counselor to the President reads like a scene from a mob movie. title: Kamala Harris smiling awkwardly in viral video as Bidens ignore: 'They freaking hate her'
content: President Joe Biden and vice president Kamala Harris were seen together at the Kennedy Center Honors Sunday but it could not be more awkward with the Bidens ignoring the presence of Kamala Harris and Doug Emhoff in a viral video -- even when they four pose together for the cameras. In the viral video, they did not exchange glances or smiles or pretend to know each other.
summary: President Joe Biden and vice president Kamala Harris were seen together at the Kennedy Center Honors Sunday but it could not be more awkward with the Bidens ignoring the presence of Kamala Harris and Doug Emhoff in a viral video -- even when they four pose together for the cameras. In the viral video, they did not exchange glances or smiles or pretend to know each other.

title: Hope rekindled: Syrian refugees return home after Bashar al-Assad’s ouster
MIT 'expels' PhD student Prahlad Iyengar for pro-Palestine essay
content: MIT PhD student Prahlad Iyengar has been suspended until 2026 following a pro-Palestine essay published in a student magazine. ​The October issue of the magazine included the article “On Pacifism,” which featured imagery and language that “could be interpreted as a call for more violent or destructive forms of protest at MIT,” according to an email sent by MIT Dean of Student Life David Warren Randall to the editors of the magazine.
summary: MIT PhD student Prahlad Iyengar has been suspended until 2026 following a pro-Palestine essay published in a student magazine. ​The October issue of the magazine included the article “On Pacifism,” which featured imagery and language that “could be interpreted as a call for more violent or destructive forms of protest at MIT,” according to an email sent by MIT Dean of Student Life David Warren Randall to the editors of the magazine.

title: Star Wars: How Musk vs Bezos space race could reshape humanity
content: Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk are like rival Jedi Masters battling for control of the galaxy's destiny. Bezos, the Obi-Wan Kenobi of space, envisions protecting Earth, the "Chosen One," by moving industries to orbital sanctuaries—akin to peaceful Alderaan. Musk, the bold Luke Skywalker, dreams of leading humanity to Mars, a Tatooine-like refuge, to survive inevitable cataclysms. Their rivalry mirrors a Star Wars saga, from dueling over NASA’s “Death Star” contracts to trading jabs like lightsaber strikes. Whether Bezos’ industrial "Rebel Alliance" or Musk’s Martian "Empire" prevails, their cosmic clash will shape humanity’s next chapter in this galactic epic.
summary: Jeff Bezos and Elon Musk are like rival Jedi Masters battling for control of the galaxy's destiny.
